document.full_text: syrian security forces swept into the coastal city of banias on tuesday, a protest leader said, taking control of another urban center from demonstrators challenging the authoritarian rule of president bashar al-assad.
document.title: syrian forces crack down on protesters in banias
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces swept into the coastal city of banias on tuesday, a protest leader said, taking control of another urban center from demonstrators challenging the authoritarian rule of president bashar al-assad.
